flavorText: "Welcome to the Legion. You saved a district—now let's go save the world."

foreignData.text: Lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Die Kreatur erhält Erstschlag bis zum Ende des Zuges. Du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: "Benvenuta nella Legione. Hai salvato un distretto... ora andiamo a salvare il mondo."
foreignData.name: Promozione sul Campo
foreignData.text: Metti un segnalino +1/+1 su una creatura bersaglio. Quella creatura ha attacco improvviso fino alla fine del turno. Guadagni 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 「ボロス軍へようこそ。君はこの管区を救った。次は世界を救ってくれ。」

foreignData.flavorText: "군단에 온 것을 환영하네. 자네는 거리를 구했네—이제는 세계를 구하러 가세."

name: Battlefield Promotion
originalText: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Battlefield Promotion tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You don’t gain 2 life.

text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
